about_me.title: About me üë®‚Äçüíª
about_me.description: I'm a computer science technician and data analyst with nearly 2 years of experience developing solutions for large corporate and banking clients at PBS El Salvador using Quadient. Recently, I started designing and building front-end solutions with Figma and React, expanding my skill set beyond back-end and data processes. I'm passionate about continuous learning and driven by the challenge of building efficient applications. I aim to grow into a well-rounded developer, contributing to products that combine robust architecture, clean code, and great user experience.

summary.title: Junior Front-end Developer
summary.description: I have been working with Atlantida Insurance in Honduras, designing and developing a digital onboarding platform for their customers and a back-office system to manage data. This experience strengthened my teamwork skills and improved cross-functional communication to deliver successful solutions.

summary.title: Quadient Data Analyst
summary.description: As a Data Analyst and Quadient Developer, I designed and optimized automated workflows for high-volume document production, ETL for financial/government data, and database solutions in PostgreSQL. I also built internal JS/REST tools and integrated Mailjet for large-scale distribution while providing technical support to key financial clients (accuracy, performance, and service continuity).

main_projects.title: Orkesta App
main_projects.description: A university, project-focused to-do app designed to organize tasks, track progress, and keep workflow in sync. It can manage personal or team projects.

main_projects.title: PopCorn Cinema
main_projects.description: A personal film log designed to track movies watched, rate each title, and organize viewing history.

main_projects.title: Travelling App
main_projects.description: An interactive travel log that allows users to mark places they've visited on a world map and save personal notes. Designed to visualize travel history and create a personalized map of memories across the globe.

small_projects.title: A React Quiz
small_projects.description: A small interactive quiz with 15 questions about React fundamentals. It tracks the user‚Äôs score, provides instant feedback, and is designed to practice core concepts in a fun, lightweight format.

small_projects.title: Bill Splitter
small_projects.description: A simple tool to track shared expenses with friends, showing who paid and who still owes money.

summary.title: Computer Science Engineering
summary.description: Currently pursuing an Engineering degree, strengthening algorithms, data structures, OOP, SQL, computer networks, operating systems (Windows/Linux), software engineering (Git, testing, Agile), and web development with React.

summary.title: Computer Technician Degree
summary.description: I built a solid foundation in computer science: algorithms, data structures, object-oriented programming, SQL, and operating systems (Windows Server and Linux-based).

summary.title: The Ultimate React Course 2025: React, Next.js, Redux & More with Jonas Schmedtmann
summary.description: I‚Äôve been taking a React course to build from basics to advanced skills‚Äîlearning hooks, state management, context, effects, performance optimization, and how to use React DevTools (component tree and profiler).
